headline: As Fears of Pandemic Grow, China Puts 20 Million on Lockdown
abstract: The new travel restrictions include 12 cities as the death toll climbed to 26. In the epicenter, anxiety prevailed as mistrustful residents crowded into hospitals.
lead_paragraph: WUHAN, China â€” The authorities drastically expanded a travel lockdown in central China on Thursday, essentially penning in more than 35 million residents to contain a deadly virus that is overwhelming hospitals and fueling fears of a pandemic.
